results.title: Metformin improves peripheral vascular flow in nonhyperlipidemic patients with arterial disease.

results.title: [Effectiveness of metformin in prevention of development of hyperglycemia and neuronal damage caused by ischemic stress].
results.text_hl: Furthermore, the regulation of @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@post-ischemic glucose intolerance@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced activation of peripheral AMPK contributes to the reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Arterial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002539 @@@cerebral ischemic neuronal damage@@@.
